ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 232
ygData.msgSnippet: While enchanters CAN solo, we are a GROUP class. Find a decent group and your special skills will start to shine.
ygData.messageBody:
While enchanters CAN solo, we are a GROUP class. Find a decent group and
your special skills will start to shine.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jenni [SMTP:freya@...]
> Sent: Thursday, February 24, 2000 9:38 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 232
>
> From: Jenni <freya@...>
>
> I think for now I'm going to stay in Guk, or Rathe Mtns. Both zones are
> rarely
> crowded, and the lower level mobs that I can kill are rarely camped. I'm
> getting sick of the crowded zones. Befallen is OK, but it seemed a bit
> crowded
> for me. My only experience with Najena was when I zoned in and ended up
> in a
> room full of magicians and pets and promptly got killed and almost lost my
> corpse for good. I do want to go there in a few more levels though.
>
> Question about Soloing: Now that I'm 16 it's been very difficult for me
> to
> solo, even with a pet. My new level 16 spells use tons of mana, and I end
> up
> either running out before I kill the mob, or coming very close to it.
> Either
> way I end up medding and healing for a long time between kills. It hardly
> seems
> efficient. Any suggestions on soloing at level 16?
>
> -Ezrae
> 16th level DE Enchantress
> Brell Serilis
>
>
> Andrew Collins wrote:
>
> > From: Andrew Collins <ACollins@...>
> >
> > Gossimer armor can be found in Unrest, rarely in Runnyeye, but 2 good
> spots
> > to find gossimer are Befallen and Najena. However it isnt as easy as
> guk.
> >
> > Im glad to see someone appreciates Upper Guk... I loved that place and
> Lower
> > as well...
> >
